requestCompensation.artworkContributionAgreementMessage: I, the individual controlling Ethereum address :ethAddress, hereby waive all copyright and all related or neighboring rights, together with any associated claims or causes of action, to the extent permitted by law. I have read and understand the terms and intended legal effect of the Nouns Art Contribution Agreement, available at :agreementUrl, and hereby voluntarily elect to apply it to this contribution. Contribution name: :contributionName. Contribution specification: :contributionSpec.
